TriggerKeyFeature Class Reference
[APOXI Template Layer]

This features posts a key down message with a given key code. It can be used to send key events from a menu item, since this feature can be used in a menu. More...

Detailed Description

This features posts a key down message with a given key code. It can be used to send key events from a menu item, since this feature can be used in a menu.
